Title: Requires notice of adverse step therapy determinations
Summary: Requires written notice of an adverse determination made by a utilization review agent in relation to a step therapy protocol override determination.
LawCode: Amd §§4902 & 4903, Ins L; amd §§4902 & 4903, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to requiring notice of adverse step therapy determinations
